title: HDFC Bank eyes fintech tie-ups to co-create solutions
description: HDFC Bank is seeking fintech partnerships to develop tech solutions for loans, payments, customer service, and small business banking. This strategy aims to leverage the strengths of both entities to scale its business. Successful collaborations include PayzApp and Vyapaar platforms created with Zeta and Mintoak.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
